## TestOptions interface

Set of options provided by assistive-playwright-test at the test level which can be specified in the Playwright configuration file.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TestOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [vmMouseCalibrationOptions](./assistive-playwright-test.testoptions.vmmousecalibrationoptions.md) | [CalibrationOptions](./assistive-playwright-client.calibrationoptions.md) | Options to use when calibrating the mouse for the current page. |
